recommended_degree: Matematika, Fisika, Arsitektur, Desain Interior, Teknik Sipil (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Accountability:
a.	Prepare quotation by studying and reading plans, updating specifications, identifying customer requirement, evaluating take off compared to purchase order to identify any differences.
b.	Maintain professional and technical knowledge with regards to the Australian Building code, research and maintain technological excellence in work.
c.	Ensure quote lead times and quality standards are met.
Qualifications:
a.	Willing to be placed in Majalengka, West Java. 
b.	Well verse in English, both spoken and written.
c.	Min.D3, preferably from Engineering or Science major of study. 
d.	Able to interpret technical drawings, blueprints, and specifications.
e.	Proficient in ERP, Titan, or Salesforce is a plus.
